title: Make American Horror Story Great, Again!
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: I've signed it already, best of luck! :)
I feel like you would make Ahs amazing! Signed! Hopefully they pick you.
Hopefully you will be a writer in season 8. Have followed this channel since Roanoke.

All it ever takes is one good time. I hope you are chosen. I have heard about you outside of youtube of your works and its nothing but rave reviews. Id love to see what your mind can conjure up in the ahs world
I just signed the petition. Good luck!!! : ) 👍👍👌
description:
PLEASE NOTE: I think American Horror Story is amazeballs, the title is just a pun. 

Petition Link to MAKE MARY AN AMERICAN HORROR STORY WRITER:
